document_data.name: Mariners' Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mariners' Hall''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Master Mariners' Guild]].
document_data.Location: This building was located along [[Cedar Street]], just off the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]], in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].

Structure.Interior: The main floor of the Mariners' Hall featured full tavern facilities, a private bar for visiting members of the Master Mariners' Guild. Elsewhere in the building were accommodations, also for visiting members of the guild.

document_data.Reputation: The Mariners' Hall was among some of the more notable and recognizable buildings in the Dock Ward, considered by locals to be a landmark.
document_data.Trivia: Behind a loose stone in the minaret atop this roof was a cavity where the [[wizard]] [[Coril]] hid their [[spellbook]]s.
